LanguageData.VEF_AcidBuildup.label: acid burn
LanguageData.VEF_AcidBuildup.description: A splash of acid that continues to cause burn wounds for quite some time after the initial attack.

LanguageData.VEF_AcidBuildup.stages.2.label: serious, receiving burns

LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.description: This creature feeds on sunlight. Inadequate levels of light will kill it.
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.label: level of sunlight
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.stages.0.label: adequate light
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.stages.1.label: poor light levels
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.stages.2.label: very low light levels
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.stages.3.label: lack of sunlight
LanguageData.VEF_LightSustenance.stages.4.label: extreme lack of sustenance
